alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Corson and northeastern Dewey Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trail City to near Glencross to near Little Moreau Rec Area. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Trail City around 610 PM MDT. White Horse around 615 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Promise and Blackfoot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
